Think this could be it, the true love you've been looking for? Swipe right, aka come meet me at the shelter today!

name: Finnegan
description_html:
Finnegan is an affectionate, handsome boy who loves his people, his toys, and his walks. He is very housetrained, easy on a leash, and is very smart, knowing tricks like sit, shake, and down. He could also potentially live with another dog after a meet & greet at Austin Animal Services. Do you have a home for Finnegan and his iconic floppy ears? Meet him today!

Interested in Finnegan? Reach out to blueplusbusters@gmail.com for more info!

name: Angel
description_html: Meet Angel - your future adventure buddy with a heart of gold! Angel is a smart, loyal girl who picks up new things quickly and keeps us smiling with her charming personality. She's housetrained, crate trained, and does well being left alone for a few hours. Like many young dogs, she still has some puppy behaviors-like mouthiness-that she's working on. She's also making great progress with leash reactivity through training and already showing improvement. Angel would thrive in a home with a fenced yard where she can run and play. While she could do well in a family setting, she tends to bond closely with one person and would be an amazing, loyal companion for someone looking for a smart, active partner.

name: Alfie
description_html:
After seven months in a kennel, Alfie has had some time in a foster home and is finally discovering what it means to be someone's beloved dog‚Äîand he's absolutely flourishing. This handsome, 1.5 year old brindle boy wakes up every morning with pure joy, tail wagging wildly just at the sound of his name. He's still learning how his body works and how big he really is, but his enthusiasm for life and love is undeniable.

Alfie's ideal day includes trail walks at Walnut Creek or Southeast Metropolitan Park, where he'll take his time orienting with a good sniff before settling into a comfortable pace‚Äîsome jogging included if you're up for it! He's unfazed by the chaos of the world around him (cyclists, construction, strollers‚Äîbring it on) and would happily greet every person and pup he encounters. Back home, he's your kitchen companion who loves watching you cook without counter surfing or being a nuisance, your work-from-home buddy who won't interrupt your conference calls, and your most enthusiastic car ride passenger who respectfully enjoys the view from the back seat. Whether you're hitting a food truck where he'll charm the baristas or running errands, Alfie is thrilled to be along for the ride.

He's got the basics down‚Äîsit, stay, wait, come, lay down‚Äîand his food motivation makes training a breeze. He's housetrained, crate-trained, and non-destructive when left alone. Yes, he's still mastering polite greetings (his excitement sometimes means jumping and enthusiastic kisses), but with high-value treats and consistency, he's making progress. Once the initial excitement fades, he's content to chew his toy while you visit with friends. He's dog-social from his shelter playgroup days and could live with another well-matched pup. With medium-high energy that's easily satisfied by two daily walks and enrichment toys, he balances adventure with serious nap skills.

Alfie is loyal, loving, and ready to give his whole heart to a single adult, couple, or family with kids 12 and up. This playful, affectionate, smart boy has already proven he fits seamlessly into a loving home, and now he's ready for his forever.


Email Alfie's shelter volunteer advocates at blueplusbusters@gmail.com to meet him and start the process to foster or adopt!

name: Xena
description_html:
Get to know Xena......... a loving brindle babe!

Xena is very smart and quick learner with the help of treats. She knows sit, shake, down, and kisses. Treats and food are big motivators and help to distract her when necessary. She is low to medium energy and rarely barks.

Xena casually strolls on a leash, but does get excited when she sees squirrels and lizards. She doesn't seem bothered by passing people or other dogs at a distance. She understands "Let's go and This Way." Expect to see some zoomies in a backyard. She likes to chase soccer balls. She is also happy to sit outside with her human and people-watch.

Spending time with Xena inside - She is housetrained. She will self-entertain with toys of all kinds, not a picky girl. Give her a smoked beef bone with marrow, and she is the happiest dog. Loves, loves, loves belly rubs!!! She is at ease when being groomed (bath, nails, and ears).

Xena loves car rides and is an excellent passenger. She does not jump over seats in an SUV. She will alternate looking out the window and lying down.

Xena is a great catch! Check her out!

interested in Xena? Reach out to blueplusbusters@gmail.com for more info!

name: Yeti
description_html:
Looking for a calm, cuddly companion? Yeti is your guy! This sweet, gentle, and mellow pup has been at the shelter since July, patiently waiting for his perfect match.


Yeti is very house trained, leash trained, and has the perfect medium energy‚Äîalways ready for a walk, then a nap and some cuddles. He loves food and treats and enjoys the company of other chill dogs.


Oh, and he‚Äôs kind of a star‚ÄîYeti made a TV appearance on FOX 7, charming everyone he met!

See the segment here: https://www.fox7austin.com/video/1087057


If you‚Äôre looking for a laid-back, loving best friend, Yeti‚Äôs your match. Come meet this handsome boy today and see why everyone‚Äôs falling for him!

name: Beef
description_html:
Beef is a handsome young pup with cute puppy eyes that show all the love he has to give! Beef loves fun and games; he lives for fetch and a good romp with any ball!


Beef isn't just a playful goofball; he also shows his true gentlemanly side. He's already housetrained and walks like a pro, making him great on a leash. Plus, he's shown to be dog-friendly and done well in playgroups. 


Ready for a devoted, ball-loving companion to bring some joy to your life? Beef is ready for his forever home!


If you have any questions, please reach out to orangedotcrew@gmail.com

name: Sweet Pea
description_html:
Meet Sweet Pea

This cuddler and a charmer is home tested and has all the important skills expected of a mature lady, She's loving, attentive, very housetrained, mannered, rides well in the car. At less than 60 lbs she's smaller statured. She's spayed and heart worm negative and ready to go home right away. .


Sweet Pea prefers not to cohabitate with other pets. Sweet Pea has had some past traumas and being in close proximity to other dogs at the shelter has been very unnerving for her. An ideal setting will be with a loving family in a home setting where she can find her zen. She's so ready for that. Are you ready to meet this pretty lady? Sweet Pea is advocated for by the orangedotcrew@gmail.com - reach out with questions or come by to meet her.

name: Biggie
description_html:
Biggie is a big baby looking for someone to show him that the world isn't such a scary place! He's made great strides, he loves meeting new friends and getting out of his kennel for short walks, but the shelter is just too darn loud and feels scary.


This guy is housetrained and has previous experience living with dogs. He loves to take treats and sit and smile and get his butt scratched. Biggie is a big cuddler looking for a cozy couch and a ticket out of the shelter, where he can settle into a home and start living the life every dog deserves. Come meet this big baby Biggie boy today!

name: Maggie
description_html:
Meet Maggie üêæ

Maggie is a tender-hearted girl who is ready for a fresh start. She‚Äôs a sweet, affectionate pup who forms strong bonds with her people and truly thrives on connection. Once she trusts you, she‚Äôs incredibly loving and enjoys spending time close by your side.


She recently went on an outing and was such a delight‚Äîcalm, gentle, and easygoing the whole time. Maggie was a breeze to leash up and happily soaked up attention, showing off just how much of a cuddle bug she truly is.


Maggie has experience living in a home and has shown she can settle in nicely with structure and routine. She walks well on leash and enjoys getting out for fresh air and enrichment. She‚Äôs also dog-social with appropriate introductions and has previously lived alongside another dog.


Maggie is looking for a committed adopter who will give her the stability and love. In return, you‚Äôll gain a loyal, devoted companion with a wonderfully easygoing nature.

name: Ellie
description_html:
Sweet, silly, and affectionate, Ellie is the most beautiful golden girl looking for a soft place to land and a family to call her own. On the labrador retriever color spectrum, one might say she lands somewhere between "lightly toasted" and "golden." She has the most adorable ears (one that sticks up and the other that flops over) and the cutest docked tail. She has shared foster homes with dogs of all sizes and energy levels. She is a fantastic dog friend because she knows how to match the energy and respect the boundaries of anyone she plays with. Ellie is house-trained, walks well on leash, and is relatively quiet (not a barker from what her foster parents can tell). She is non-destructive when left alone in the home, and sleeps well throughout the night. When out and about she has met babies, toddlers, teens, and seniors, and has done well with everyone. Her favorite things include walks, napping, car rides, playing, and belly rubs! If you decide to stop petting her, be prepared for her to ask for "more pets, please!" Ellie is not a fan of rabbits, cats, confining spaces, or loud sudden noises.


Because not a whole lot is known about her past, Ellie can still be shy in new situations and around people she doesn't know. In these situations, usually a high-value treat and a little patience goes a long way to winning her over. Ellie would thrive in a home where she can demand all the belly rubs her heart desires, a doggy (or human) friend, and a cozy place to curl up.


Click "Get Started" to connect with this beautiful pup in person!

name: Sam Winchester
description_html:
Sam & Dean Winchester are a bonded pair and must be adopted together. They truly bring double the love. ‚ù§Ô∏è ‚ù§Ô∏è


‚ù§Ô∏è These two super affectionate, people-friendly boys light up any room they enter. They love treats, walks, and they‚Äôre great leash walkers. They‚Äôre also friendly with other dogs and are happiest side-by-side, always sticking close and licking each other‚Äôs faces.


‚ù§Ô∏è They‚Äôre the kind of duo that makes your days easier: two happy faces at the door, two cuddle buddies on the couch, and two best friends who keep each other company when you‚Äôre busy. If you‚Äôve been wanting two big, fluffy dogs who will adore you, keep each other company, and fill your home with twice the tail wags and cuddles, Sam & Dean are ready to meet you today.


You can see DEan's profile here: https://adopt.adopets.com/pet/3f3d217c-f37a-43a0-a29f-dead2df670ad?tracking=866b0f87-efbb-4576-8f61-9b6af49830ad

name: Mae
description_html:
Meet Mae! She's a friendly girl who loves a game of fetch. Mae is very friendly once she gets to know you and will climb in your lap for cuddles and pets. 46 pounds isn't too big to be a lap dog, right? We don't think so! Mae gets along well with her current room mate at the shelter, too. She goes potty like a champ outside. What more can you ask for? Adopt Mae today!

Interested in Mae? Reach out to blueplusbusters@gmail.com for more info!

name: Dean Winchester
description_html:
Sam & Dean Winchester are a bonded pair and must be adopted together. They truly bring double the love. ‚ù§Ô∏è ‚ù§Ô∏è


‚ù§Ô∏è These two super affectionate, people-friendly boys light up any room they enter. They love treats, walks, and they‚Äôre great leash walkers. They‚Äôre also friendly with other dogs and are happiest side-by-side, always sticking close and licking each other‚Äôs faces.


‚ù§Ô∏è They‚Äôre the kind of duo that makes your days easier: two happy faces at the door, two cuddle buddies on the couch, and two best friends who keep each other company when you‚Äôre busy. If you‚Äôve been wanting two big, fluffy dogs who will adore you, keep each other company, and fill your home with twice the tail wags and cuddles, Sam & Dean are ready to meet you today.


You can see Sam's profile here: https://adopt.adopets.com/pet/18953a9f-c841-4e61-81b9-71f49ce0fca6?tracking=e9bbde43-017f-437f-9ded-b0a4183f733f

name: Shamu
description_html: Poblano has been through some tough times and he's not the happiest camper at the shelter. He's lived with other cats before but doesn't seem to enjoy their company, so he would do much better on his own. Poblano can be a hidey cat when he's not feeling brave. He may prefer a calmer home with a cat savvy person to set him up for success. He's not a great fit for small children or dogs. This poor guy could use a place to decompress and get his kitty life back on track!

name: Sosa
description_html:
Sweet Sosa sees mostly shadows and light but it doesn't stop him from participating in life. He can hear and follow his foster when she calls his name, claps her hands or whistles. He's learned his indoor and outdoor boundaries really well. Each change of living situation will require a short relearning period,


Sosa likes to play with and follow the resident dog who's about the same size and a little younger. Sosa loves squeaky toys and balls, and a roll in the grass, cuddles, belly rubs and even taking a walk in his neighborhood on leash. Sosa has been given access to use the doggie door after learning the outdoor space well, and more impressively, he'll even pick up a toy from living room, walk through doggie door and drop the toy in the backyard all by himself.


Sosa's health needs have been caught up while in foster care. He's even had a dental. An allergy shot helps him stay comfortable during seasonal changes.


It's onward to the best of the rest of his life to a safe, loving home.

Apply on his link to start a conversation with his foster mom.

name: Jojo
description_html: Jojo is a somewhat shy boy (especially with new people), but he doesn't let that stop him from enjoying walks with friends. He walks very well on leash and is easy to direct. His favorite snack might be cat treats. Maybe because of his tiger stripes? Jojo spent a short time in a home with children and enjoyed their company. He may need slow introductions with other dogs until he is feeling confident in a new home. Jojo is well mannered and mellow, a gentle boy who is ready for his home!

name: Jr
description_html:
JR has come a long way since first arriving at the shelter ‚Äî from a shy, shut-down pup to a gentle, curious companion who‚Äôs learning that people can be pretty great.


This shy guy prefers quiet moments, and he‚Äôs been making steady progress with patient volunteers. Now, he happily comes forward for walks, enjoys slow laps around the yard, and even offers sweet ‚Äúnose boops‚Äù to his favorite humans in exchange for treats.


JR seems house-trained, food-motivated, and does best when the world moves at his pace. He‚Äôs looking for a calm home with understanding people who will give him time to settle in and continue blossoming into a loving dog.

name: Franco
description_html: üêæ Meet Mr. Franco - Your Gentle Giant in Training! üêæ Looking for an adolescent pup who's already house, potty, and crate trained? Good with dog-savvy kids? Happy to chill by your side while you work or watch TV? Full of personality and gets along with other dogs? Then Mr. Franco might just be your unicorn! Franco is a big-hearted goofball who doesn't quite realize his own size. He's the perfect mix of cuddly and calm, with bursts of excited energy when it's time to play, especially with people, pups, or when there's food involved. Franco was recently in foster care, where he worked hard on his recall, patience, and manners. Like many tall boys, he's been known to counter-surf, but his foster mom assures us: "We're working on it!" Hand him a toy or a bone, and Franco's in heaven. üè° Ideal Home: Franco will thrive in a home that can offer him a balance of activity and downtime-think daily walks or dog park play, followed by some solid couch cuddles. Due to his size and puppy energy, we recommend a home without cats and without very young children, unless they're experienced with dogs.

name: Mr Kitten
description_html:
Built like a tank but with a heart as squishy as a land manatee, this big blockhead is basically a canine Travis Kelce: charming, incredibly good looking, and impossible not to love.

Mr. Kitten has excellent leash manners and is wonderfully patient with newer volunteers‚Äîhe‚Äôll let beginners practice harnessing without a fuss. He‚Äôs calm and collected walking past kennels or other dogs, taking everything in stride with his signature mellow confidence.

Under that handsome gray coat is the sweetest heart you‚Äôll ever meet. Don‚Äôt let his size fool you: he‚Äôs a gentle giant through and through. On the leash, he‚Äôs a loose-leash pro; off the leash, he becomes the world‚Äôs cuddliest couch companion with plenty of surface area for snuggles.

Kind, loving, and endlessly mellow, Mr. Kitten is the dog who wins people over instantly. Come meet him‚Äîyour only regret will be not doing it sooner.


Additional Foster Notes

Wow, he's amazing! In addition to the notes above, he's not vocal (doesn't bark), doesn't beg for food, allows bathing and grooming, he's potty trained, and does well in crowds with screaming kiddos and music. He's a great car passenger and was fantastic with my 6 year old niece.

name: Jelly
description_html:
A gentle, shy girl with a heart full of love just waiting to bloom, Jelly is a calm, observant pup who feels most at ease in a quiet, low-traffic home - the perfect match for a homebody who enjoys cozy nights in and the occasional walk or adventure. She is house-trained, making her an easy addition to your home.


Jelly finds comfort and confidence around other dogs. She loves playing and cuddling with her foster roommate and would thrive in a home with a friendly canine companion.


When her humans are relaxing, Jelly is right there beside them - peaceful and content. She may take some time to earn your trust, but once she does, she‚Äôll be your loyal little shadow. Her herding instincts make her an attentive, quick learner who would love puzzle toys, enrichment activities, or fun training sessions.


Jelly enjoys running in the backyard and walks beautifully on a leash, calmly minding her own business around other dogs and people. She‚Äôs also polite with cats - she simply lets them be.


She‚Äôs still learning that chews are hers to enjoy, and her sweet, cautious nature makes every new discovery a joy to witness.


If you‚Äôre looking for a gentle soul to share your quiet moments and daily routines, Jelly is ready to melt into your heart and your home.

name: Cornelia
description_html: Cornelia is a little shy with new people but a total goofball once she lets loose. At 1 year old she is still bursting with puppy energy - she loves toys, fetch, and would splash around in some water and run around all day if you'd let her! Looking for a high-energy side-kick to all your adventures? Cornelia is your gal!

name: Nayla
description_html:
Nayla is one special girl who will absolutely steal your heart from the very first hello. She‚Äôs friendly, fun, and full of affection, always ready for a splash in the pool or a good game of fetch. But don‚Äôt let her playful side fool you‚Äîshe also knows how to slow down and get super cozy, especially when she‚Äôs wrapped up in her favorite blankets, just soaking up all the love from her people.


This sweetheart is house-trained and walks beautifully on a leash, making her an easy companion for both busy days and relaxed evenings. Nayla‚Äôs the perfect size for cuddles, adventures, and everything in between.


Her beautiful salt-and-pepper face gives her an undeniable old soul charm, and you can tell she‚Äôs patiently waiting to find her forever family‚Äîthe perfect match who will cherish her just as much as she will them.


If you‚Äôre searching for a loyal, loving companion who thrives on connection and cuddles, Nayla might just be the one to fill your life with joy and warmth.

name: Jack
description_html:
Say hello to Jack! This striking, chocolate-colored pup is a delightful mix of playful and calm energy. Jack is a smart cookie who absolutely loves food and treats! He's always up for a good walk and romp in the yard, but he's also happy to settle down for a relaxing afternoon. He is an affectionate guy who loves to give and receive affection.  

With his beautiful amber eyes and friendly demeanor, Jack is ready to bring his loving, well-mannered self into your heart and home.

name: Tea
description_html:
Yerba and Tea came in as silly little stray scaredy kittens. They are on a journey of self-reflection. Their goal is to be braver with people! Yerba and Tea enjoy play time with wand toys, and though they may take some time to warm up to new people, we think they will reach their goal sooner than later. They may do best in a calm home with a cat friend to learn from and a patient adopter to help them on their journey.


Yerba and Tea are now a part of our Cactus Cat program for shy cats who need a little help from volunteers. They don't have to go home together, but do enjoy each other's company.


I am a DHC, and I have my own webpage!


The adoption fee is waived for Tea and all Cactus Cats/Desperate Housecats!

name: Yerba
description_html:
Yerba and Tea came in as silly little stray scaredy kittens. They are on a journey of self-reflection. Their goal is to be braver with people! Yerba and Tea enjoy play time with wand toys, and though they may take some time to warm up to new people, we think they will reach their goal sooner than later. They may do best in a calm home with a cat friend to learn from and a patient adopter to help them on their journey. Yerba and Tea are now a part of our Cactus Cat program for shy cats who need a little help from volunteers. They don't have to go home together, but do enjoy each other's company.


I am a DHC, and I have my own webpage!


The adoption fee is waived for Yerba and all Cactus Cats/Desperate Housecats!

name: Hank
description_html: Hank is such a lovable guy! He's full of energy and loves zooming around the backyard, playing tug of war, and keep away games. But he also knows how to kick back and relax-whether he's lounging on the floor or curled up in his cozy bed. Hank's pretty smart too-he can sit, lie down, roll over, and shake. He's still learning how to walk nicely on a leash, but he's eager to improve. Overall, Hank's a sweet goofball who just needs a wonderful home to share his love!

name: Tom Pitty
description_html:
Free fall into love with Tom Pitty!  


This heartbreaker is 2 years young, full of joy and has eyes that you can get lost in.  He's runnin' down a dream that he'll find his forever family soon, and isn't backing down until he meets his perfect match. Qualities must include: likes to share their peanut butter, enjoys long walks where he can stop and smell the wildflowers, will drive during long car rides listening to 80s rock, and must love afternoon naps on the couch. But don‚Äôt worry, Tom Pitty always brings something to the party.


He knows love is a long road, and is looking for someone who's in it for the long haul. Nick-named the "Happiest Boy at the Shelter" by his volunteer friends, he's known for always having a smile on his face!


Don‚Äôt be just another face in the crowd, send us an email today and we can help you meet him!

 blueplusbusters@gmail.com

name: Gus
description_html:
Gus' foster says: "Gus is a sweet, young, chill, and friendly boy. He is good on walks and totally crate trained. He is in obedience training now and doing great! Sit, stay, leave it, etc.

He is good with dogs ‚Äì my older pups tell him off occasionally for being rambunctious, and he takes it in stride and gives them some space. He is a lovable, funloving guy and is even learning to get along with my cat."

name: Petey
description_html:
Petey is a little guy with a big heart. He loves his people and would love nothing more than a house with lots of toys and a spot on the couch. Or, the floor. Or anywhere. Petey is known to be able to fall asleep on any surface and in any position. But, his favorite spot will always be near his people.


Petey walks great on a leash and can self entertain with toys. He seems to prefer chewing on hard toys but would probably enjoy a variety. He loves to be pet and gets occasional zoomies. A volunteer who took him on an outing to her home noted that he loves car rides and curled up immediately and fell asleep in the backseat. She also gave him up a thumbs up for no accidents in the house and very polite manners. He won‚Äôt get on the couch unless invited.


Petey has lived with another dog at the shelter and is known as a co-exister in play group. He could go home with a well-matched dog after a meet and greet.


Whether he‚Äôs an only pet or is joining your pack, Petey will be a sweet and gentle companion who would love to fall asleep in your lap.

name: Stir Fry
description_html:
Stir Fry has the joyful heart of a child who lives to play! His favorite toy is a tennis ball, and his favorite game is batting it around to chase. When Stir Fry‚Äôs not busy entertaining himself with a ball, he loves to sniff the world around him on a walk. The only thing he asks for is some personal space on his walks - he‚Äôs not always sure if strangers are friendly or not, and he prefers to play it safe. 


Stir Fry has demonstrated that he is extremely house trained and is always anxiously waiting to go potty as soon as he is out of his kennel. He loves treats (meaty or cheesy, he says!) and will gladly sit for them. Stir Fry also loves going to play group with his doggy friends, so if you‚Äôre looking to add someone to your pack, you can set up a Meet & Greet for your resident pup and Stir Fry. This guy is ready for a life of love and play time!

name: Ravioli
description_html:
Meet Ravioli, a lovely shepherd who is as scrumptious as his name! At first glance, his most striking feature is his wide, infectious smile, which he carries everywhere, an indicator of his sunny disposition and zest for life.

Ravioli is a fantastic companion for brisk walks and hanging around the house. He absolutely loves fetch and chasing balls, and is getting quite good at it! He‚Äôs also housetrained and respectful of his indoor space. He also loves splashing around in the kiddie pool and bringing his toys and balls with him into the water for extra fun.  

While he is a spirited and playful adventurer, Ravioli transforms into the ultimate cuddler once the day‚Äôs activities are done. He loves nothing more than to curl up close and share quiet time with his favorite person. He loves a back scratch and will cozy up right against you. Give Ravioli a squeaky toy, a long walk, and a good cuddle, and you‚Äôll receive unending joy in return!

name: Haiyan
description_html:
Haiyan is an adorable deaf puppy with a heart full of love and a tail that never stops wagging! This playful little guy is dog-social, always up for a game of chase or a cuddle session with a furry friend. His joyful spirit and irresistible cuteness make him an instant favorite with everyone he meets.

Being in the shelter is tough for a puppy like Haiyan‚Äîhe‚Äôs ready for a cozy home, a warm bed, and someone to show him the ropes. Because he‚Äôs deaf, he‚Äôll need a bit of patience and guidance as he learns the world in his own way, but he‚Äôs already full of curiosity and happiness.

Haiyan would thrive in a home with another friendly dog to help show him the ropes, and a family who‚Äôs ready to love him just as he is. Could you be the soft place this sweet pup has been waiting for?

If you have any questions, please reach out to orangedotcrew@gmail.com to kickstart this heartwarming journey. For more delightful updates, follow Orange Dot Crew on Facebook and Instagram.

name: Thalia
description_html: Thalia might be the snuggliest on site. She will roll around in your lap until every body part is rubbed and kissed. She is a people lover and happy girl. She has a gorgeous smile and upbeat personality. She likes to play and bounce around but would prefer to wiggle on top of you or next to you. This is why the lap is her favorite.

name: Buddy
description_html: Meet Buddy, a very respectful young (1.5 year old) boy now living with a 17lb doddle mix and a 40lb lab mix. Though he likes being around his dog companions he really enjoys being around kids playing outside. Game of fetch or just about any other game is ok with Buddy. Inside, he is calm and surrounds himself with as many squeak toys as possible. Though a young boy, he spends most of the day chilled with afternoons reserved for a long siesta. No problems with deer just outside the fence but the occasional squirrel will grab his attention. Though Buddy spends most of the day inside given the high outdoor temps, in the evening and early morning he enjoys being outside watching the world pass. The highlight of the day is his walk. His lease etiquette is being worked on but drastically improved over a short period of time (about 70% there). Buddy understands and obeys basic commands (stay, sit, laydown, off). If he does become excited inside, a simple command to laydown works every time. He is very respectful of the two other dogs living in the house even the little one who often try's to dominate. Too, it's amazing how little he sheds, especially compared to the other two we have but this could change throughout the year. Overall a very obedient calm boy who would love to have someone to play or spend time outside.

name: Capri
description_html:
Meet Capri ‚Äî the sweetheart waiting to steal your heart.

Capri walks right beside you on a loose leash like he‚Äôs always known you. He loves to munch on a toy while getting back scratches and will happily lean in for cuddles and neck rubs.

Playful and affectionate, Capri enjoys time in the yard as much as he likes snuggling with you on the couch.

With his adorable markings, gentle personality, and endless love to give, Capri is the perfect companion for someone looking for a loyal, snuggly friend.

name: Marvin
description_html:
Marvin is a great dog! Besides being a handsome fellow, he is very house trained, easy to walk on leash, friendly and playful. Marvin loves to romp around the play yard, chasing balls and tossing his toys. He is dog social and enjoys running along the fence line playing with other friendly dogs. Marvin is treat motivated, promptly sits on command and gently takes treats. He was also recently cat tested and passed with flying colors!


Marvin also has a softer side and is a quiet, affectionate young boy who enjoys cuddle time with his person. He will make a wonderful companion in a loving home.


Come meet sweet Marvin, and take home your new best friend!

name: Filo
description_html:
Meet Filo, a 4-year-old Boxer/Lab mix with the rare trifecta: he has lived successfully with big dogs, small dogs, a cat, and a toddler ‚Äî and was described by his previous family as friendly, playful, lovable, potty trained, crate trained, and easy to handle.

In the shelter, Filo shown the same great qualities:

  • Super housetrained
  • Great with toys (fetch is his love language ‚Äî he‚Äôll even drop the ball into your hand)
  • Soft, social play style with lots of dogs
  • Affectionate, cuddly, gentle once he knows you
  • Easy to leash, easy to walk, easy to re-kennel
  • Food-motivated and fun-motivated ‚Äî the perfect combo for training

Filo‚Äôs ideal home can be almost anything: a house with a yard, an active apartment, a family with kids, a multi-pet home, or a person who wants a playful buddy who also settles beautifully. He‚Äôs a ready-made companion with real-world experience and a big, soft heart.

Come meet Filo ‚Äî he‚Äôs the kind of dog who makes a home feel warmer the minute he walks in.

name: Pat
description_html:
Pat is a 40-lb young pup with a soft heart, a goofy personality, and a bright, curious mind. He spent much of his early puppyhood growing up in the shelter, and since coming into foster care, he‚Äôs been gaining confidence and blossoming every day.


Pat can be a little shy in new environments at first, but once he feels safe, he quickly shows his affectionate, playful side. He loves snuggles, chew toys, booty scratches, backyard chase games, water play, and cheese.


As a puppy, Pat is smart and eager to learn. He already knows sit and down and would do best with a more active adopter who enjoys playing, training, and providing both mental and physical stimulation. He‚Äôs curious, responsive to gentle guidance, and will thrive with structure and engagement.


Pat is:


  • üê∂ Dog-friendly and gains confidence from other dogs
  • üè° Fully potty trained
  • üí§ Crate trained
  • ü¶Æ Easy on leash with minimal pulling
  • ‚ö° Medium energy ‚Äî playful but happy to relax and cuddle


He‚Äôs done well with other dogs in shelter playgroups and his foster home, and he‚Äôs shown very little interest in cats. With slow introductions, he has great potential to be cat-friendly.


Pat is about beagle-sized and likely won‚Äôt get much bigger, making him a great fit for apartments or homes of any size‚Äîespecially with adopters who enjoy staying active with their dog.


Pat is currently in a foster home so if you're interested in meeting him, please apply and see if this sweet, smart boy is the perfect match for your lifestyle. üíõ

name: Frog
description_html:
Frog was brought to AAS with his cat buddies after their owner moved and left them behind. He is a member of our Cactus Cats program, and is receiving confidence boosting through clicker training.

Frog is playful, and interactive play is a great way to make friends with him. He is very shy, and tends to hide, or to run when you approach him.

Frog needs a cat savvy adopter who will give him the time he needs to continue his confidence building journey. He also needs a cat friend in his new home.

I am a DHC, and I have my own webpage!

The adoption fee is waived for Frog and ALL Cactus Cats/Desperate Housecats!

name: Grr
description_html:
Meet Grr üêà‚Äç‚¨õ


Grr came into Spicewood Springs Cat Hospital‚Äôs care when her owner could no longer look after her due to health complications. They have spent the past few months helping Grr adjust to a very big life change‚Äîand she‚Äôs now ready for her next chapter.


She‚Äôs mastered office kitty life and is officially ready for bigger and better things! Grr may be slow to warm up, but once she feels safe, she‚Äôs incredibly affectionate, cuddly, and playful. She‚Äôll likely do best in a quiet home without children or other pets.


When Grr finds her person, she‚Äôll be a loyal confidant for life. üñ§

name: Mr. Shrimp
description_html:
Meet Mr. Shrimp üêæ

The Brave, Cuddly Companion You've Been Waiting For

Mr. Shrimp might have a silly name, but this young pup is all heart and courage. When he first arrived at the shelter, he was completely shut down ‚Äî scared, unsure, and desperate for comfort. He didn‚Äôt want anyone to leave his side, clinging to human connection as his anchor in a confusing world.

But oh, how far he‚Äôs come.

Thanks to patience, love, and his own incredible spirit, Mr. Shrimp's confidence has bloomed. He‚Äôs now a playful, affectionate, and curious companion who checks in often to make sure he‚Äôs being the very best boy. Whether it‚Äôs cuddling close, romping around with toys, or soaking up praise for his leash manners, he‚Äôs all about making you smile.

Mr. Shrimp is also impressively house trained and eager to learn the ropes of life outside the shelter. He‚Äôs the kind of dog who makes you feel special, just by choosing to trust you.

This brave little guy is ready for his next adventure ‚Äî could it be with you?

If you have any questions, please reach out to orangedotcrew@gmail.com to kickstart this heartwarming journey. For more delightful updates, follow Orange Dot Crew on Facebook and Instagram.

name: Tiger
description_html: Tiger‚Äôs foster says: "Tiger is a really sweet cuddly guy. He is wonderful with all people. He is really sweet with kids. We have a five-year-old who has tested this extensively and I‚Äôve never even seen him nip at her or even growl. He has some leash reactivity with other dogs sometimes but he doesn‚Äôt always bark at all dogs. I have not socialized him with other dogs so I‚Äôm not sure that going to a dog park or a heavily dog trafficked area would be a good idea for him. He is really a sweet, sweet, loving guy."

name: Disco
description_html: Per Disco's previous foster: Disco is a sweet, smart & lovable 1.5 year old pup who can be energetic and playful yet mellow when just hanging out. He is crate & potty trained, and does very well just sitting on the porch or while we watch tv! He's very well behaved, knows "sit", "down", "stay", & "place" (his crate & bed). He loves tug of war, hide & seek, and long morning & evening walks. Still a young pup, he needs long walks & play time to tire out his mind & body - we've been walking around 3-4 miles a day! Although he does get very excited on walks & pulls a bit to sniff all the smells, & play with all the dogs (usually he can walk past with some peaked interest, but sometimes he does get real excited and itches to play with a very light whine and jump - were working on his focus & distractions with treats + positive reinforcement when he looks up at us or checks in) with some consistent training & socialization I'm certain he'd keep his attention at bay in no time! Despite his happy go lucky spirit, Disco also knows how to chill at home. He's easy to get in his crate, will sleep next to you for hours during a mellow day, and overall just loves laying down close to people. He's just about 50lbs and shouldn't grow much more, so he's perfect to take in the car (his car manners are perfect) and on adventures! Disco would be a wonderful fit for an active home willing to dedicate some time towards cuddles, tug-of-war, + a little bit of discipline & consistency!

name: Bubbles
description_html:
Bubbles buckled in for a family experience as she went to her foster home.

Using equal parts playful and cuddler spirit, she has proven herself to be a fun and supportive companion for her people and dog friends.


She's also a road warrior, having spent time sharing RV space with her foster family while traveling.


Reach out to learn more about how she'll do as a member of your family.


She's advocated for by her fosters, friends and fans including ClassicCaninesATX who go the extra mile for the mature dog crowd, whether they want to act their age or not :) Bubbles is spayed, vaccinated and has had a fresh dental. caring@classiccanines.org

name: Homer
description_html:
Bringing in a Homer

Homer arrived stray and a little depleted from his adventures. He's been in a foster home getting rested and recharged where he enjoys the company of his fosters and their dog. He's been a great house guest, house trained, loves his walks and loves catching a little play action whether wriggling in the grass on his back or with his canine friend.


He's reaching his goal weight and has been neutered. Now his heartworm status is being addressed with a completion date in February. His medical care as a foster dog has been sponsored by his advocates at ClassicCaninesATX. An adopter will also receive a buffer of initial services including a $150 veterinary care credit for future services at their preferred vet clinic, along with a $100 gift card for initial supplies. It's just one way to help keep the focus where it belongs, on the transition of a deserving reconditioned mature dog to a loving and safe home, without breaking the bank.


If you're interested in adoption, reach out on his link to get connected with his foster providers.

name: Kalamazoo
description_html:
Kalamazoo is ready to charm his way into your heart. His most distinguishing feature? Those absolutely iconic ears that give him a truly unique and lovable look!

More than just looks, Kalamazoo is a sweetheart through and through. This dog-experienced youngster loves to cuddle and is incredibly affectionate, soaking up every pet you can offer. He's a dream on walks‚Äîeasy on a leash‚Äîand housetrained. His favorite pastimes include splashing in a kiddie pool and playing, especially tug of war with a rope. If you're looking for a sweet, ready-to-love companion, Kalamazoo is available and waiting to be yours!

Interested in Kalamazoo? Reach out to blueplusbusters@gmail.com for more info!

name: Toast Tina
description_html:
Sweet 3-year-old ‚Äúmini‚Äù German Shepherd


Walks nicely on a leash


Treat-motivated and eager to please


Loves cuddles and human attention


Medium energy ‚Äî great balance of play and chill time

name: Prince Eric
description_html:
Prince Eric is a handsome, cuddly German Shepherd available to adopt or foster at Austin Animal Services. This cutie is basically a big puppy and loves to be near his human. He‚Äôs playful and loves to chase toys around the yard.  He‚Äôs also so easy on a leash and walks wonderfully.

Prince Eric is just like the character from The Little Mermaid; he is ready for adventure, a total romantic, and has a kind and sensitive nature.  Ready to bring this sweet boy home?  Come meet him today!

name: Bambino
description_html:
Meet Bambino! üêæ

This handsome ~2-year-old boy is a tall, lean young lab mix with a huge heart and excellent house manners. He‚Äôs been thriving in foster care since October and is truly a joy to host, and is ready to find his forever home! Bambino is as sweet and affectionate as they come. He is truly a big baby who loves cuddles and playtime equally. He currently lives with another dog and did well in shelter playgroup.

Bambino is a perfect house guest: well-mannered and fully crate and house trained. He‚Äôs also a quick learner and a great listener!

Bambino adores his foster sister Koda, a playful 3-year-old dog and he loves his toys. He‚Äôs friendly with new people (no stranger danger) and working on handling living downtown like a pro. He has been going on trail walks and is getting experience passing lots of other dogs in high-traffic situations living in a high-rise. He is dog-friendly and playful when not in tight leash situations.

Bambino would shine in a house, townhome, or non‚Äìhigh-rise apartment - ideally somewhere without constant close-quarters dog traffic. He can live with another dog and will fill your days with love, laughter, and loyalty. üíõ

name: Henrietta
description_html:
Henrietta is a loving pup who truly just wants people to love her as much as she loves them!


This girl gets an A+ in all the areas!


  • Housetrained
  • People's best friend
  • Loves toys
  • Loves to romp around with other dogs!
  • Cuddly
  • Fantastic at self entertaining with toys - can fit 3 in her mouth at once!
  • Loves to sit with you and people watch
  • The wiggliest of butts
  • Did I mention she loves toys?


She is working hard on her leash skills that are mainly due to her not wanting to go back to kennel to be left alone.


This girl is a family girl without a family. Come meet sweet Henrietta today!

name: Bear
description_html:
Bear is the definition of a "diamond in the rough." After being found dumped on the streets with his brother, Teddy, Bear has spent his time in foster care blossoming into a brilliantly behaved, affectionate, and soulful companion. He is a sensitive soul who is looking for a partner to show him that the world is a safe place. Everyone that meets him comments on how chill he is and how sweet his personality is. He regularly wins the ladies over.


Bear is an absolute gentleman in the home. He is potty trained and crate trained, though he would much prefer to be your "bed hog" if you‚Äôll allow it! He actually jumps into the bathtub by himself and sits patiently for nail trims. He loves car rides and is ready for any road trip.


Bear is incredibly smart and highly food-motivated, which has made training a breeze. He already boasts an impressive resume of commands like: sit, stay, touch, leave it, come, shake, pound it!, lay down, and soon to be much more! He is amazing on a leash.


Because of his rough start, Bear can fearful of new people. He needs a slow introduction to strangers; while he will bravely take treats and follow commands from new friends, he prefers not to be petted until he knows he can trust you. Once you are in his "inner circle," he is a velcro dog who would follow you to the end of the earth.


Bear‚Äôs Ideal Forever Home:

  • Presence: Someone who is home more often than not to give him the reassurance he craves. He'd love to live with another dog(s) to continue to help build his confidence.
  • Patience: A family willing to advocate for his space during introductions until he feels comfortable.
  • Love: Plenty of couch space for snuggles and pets.
  • Note on Cats & Kids: Bear is looking for a no-cat (ideally) household (though he lives with them at his Foster who can provide further info) and a home without young children, as he prefers a calm, predictable people environment while he‚Äôs learning that not everyone is out to get him.


Bear survived the streets, and now he‚Äôs ready to survive a long nap on a soft bed next to his favorite person(s). Is that person you?


Follow Bear‚Äôs journey and get to know him better on Instagram: @adopt_bestboybear. You can also check out his brother Teddy who is up for adoption too!

name: Teddy
description_html:
Teddy is a handsome, 40-pound Catahoula mix with a striking dark brown patterned coat and warm amber eyes that will steal your heart. At under two years old, he‚Äôs the perfect blend of playful energy and calm affection.

This sweet boy loves to be wherever you are. He will curl up with you on the couch, hang out around the house, or join you on a walk. He enjoys running around the yard and plays wonderfully with his foster dog sibling. Teddy already knows how to sit and is working on lay/stay. He is eager to please (especially if treats are involved!).

Teddy‚Äôs favorite thing in the world is being close to his people. If you‚Äôre looking for a loyal companion who will shower you with love, follow you from room to room, and make every day brighter, Teddy is your guy!

name: Smokie
description_html:
Smokie is as handsome as he is well mannered. He originally came from a breeder and lived with a family (including 4 kiddos) for almost 2 years. When the family moved out of state, he was kept in a friend‚Äôs shed until the shelter would take him in.


We‚Äôve learned many things about this very good boy since coming under our care. Besides being house trained and knowing basic commands, he‚Äôs also good in the car, leash trained, and is up for any adventure. We‚Äôve had a few field trips with Smokie to the Mueller area. He‚Äôs calm and confident and always says thank you for field trips by giving us cuddles.


If you‚Äôre looking for a confident and handsome adventure buddy, he‚Äôs your boy!

name: Blue
description_html:
Blue is having the time of his life in a foster home where he's proven to be a perfect size for his perfectly behaved life in an apartment - he's adapted so well with his smaller frame of about 50 lbs. He's quiet and stays home alone well. He's never destructive. He's easy to manage and easy to love. He loves everyone and passed a short cat test too. He's lived with a female dog sibling before and done very well.


Your perfect match is right here... His friends at ClassicCaninesATX also have adoption support specials to help a new pet acclimate at home. Reach out on his link or write his advocates at caring@classiccanines.org

name: Marley
description_html: Marley is a pint sized, playful girl who loves spending time with people! She's friendly with everyone she meets at the shelter. She likes to bounce her way out of the kennel because she's so excited to leave it! Once outside this affectionate girl enjoys cuddles and play time. Marley lived with another dog at the shelter for a bit so may enjoy the company of another dog at home! We would love to see sweet Marley in foster care if she isn't adopted soon.

name: Loki
description_html: Loki is a very cute fun puppy. He has some energy and isn't burning it at the shelter, but is delightful in the play yard. He loves chasing toys and getting his zoomies out. He can be a little more excited on leash, but it's nothing crazy. Just toss a toy in front to keep him moving as he learns leash life. He does better after he can burn off his puppiness and will do great in a home that can help him decompress.

name: Wrigley
description_html:
Wrigley is the kind of dog who‚Äôs impossible not to adore. He‚Äôs gentle, sweet, and full of wiggly charm. The moment he steps outside, he happily nudges his head between your legs for pets and affection. He starts his walks with some excitement (he‚Äôs just so thrilled to be out!), but quickly settles into a loose-leash stroll and checks in often. Volunteers describe him as an easy, loving companion who‚Äôs just happy to be by your side.


Wrigley does well with most dogs who share his soft, gentle play style. He also thrives in a home setting, where he shows off his goofy, playful side. Though he isn‚Äôt especially treat-motivated, his eagerness to connect with people makes him a joy to work with. He does have a high prey drive, so he‚Äôll need supervision when wildlife is around and may be best suited to a home without cats or other small animals.

name: Radar
description_html:
Meet Radar!


We don't know much about Radar's past, as he was abandoned on campus one day with 4 of his siblings. Since then he's been a little shy but is starting to warm up!


On leash, Radar is a relaxed walker who enjoys moving at a comfortable pace, taking frequent sniff breaks to explore his surroundings. He‚Äôs perfectly content with a shorter walk and loves to ‚Äúcheck in‚Äù with you along the way, offering plenty of adorable nose boops.


In a house setting Radar enjoys exploring and engaging his brain. Snuffle mats are a favorite, and he clearly enjoys enrichment activities. When it comes to toys, he‚Äôs enthusiastic but polite‚Äîif you toss one, he‚Äôll happily run to grab it, drop it right away, then turn and wait patiently for you to pick it up and throw it again. He is non-destructive!


The play yard is where Radar truly shines. He comes out of his shell and loves chasing balls and toys. He is fantastic at fetch, where he will bring the ball back, drop it at your feet, and back up a few steps giving you space to pick up the ball and throw it again! He also enjoys running around and sniffing, fully taking in the environment with confidence and curiosity.


Come meet Radar today!

name: Abner
description_html:
Abner is a handsome and sweet dog who is ready to steal your heart! This stunning boy has a truly unforgettable look, thanks to his striking eyes‚Äîone bright blue and one warm brown. His unique gaze perfectly matches his wonderful personality. 

On a walk, Abner is a dream, demonstrating excellent manners and staying easy on the leash. When it's time to play, he's energetic and engaging, but he settles down just as quickly for some quality snuggle time. Above all, Abner is affectionate and believes there is no problem a good, long belly rub can't solve. If you're looking for a playful, loving companion with an undeniably captivating look, Abner is the perfect match!

name: Dom
description_html:
Dom is a fun, playful, and incredibly handsome boy who‚Äôs ready to find his forever home. He‚Äôs easy to harness, and once you toss a toy out of his kennel, he‚Äôs all in and ready to go! Dom can be strong at first on leash, but after he gets some energy out, he settles in nicely and relaxes.

Dom is very smart and listens well‚Äîhe already knows tricks and is eager to learn more, especially when food and treats are involved (they‚Äôre his favorite!). He absolutely loves spending time playing in the yard, showing off his playful and goofy side.

With a medium energy level, Dom would be a great match for an active lifestyle, and he‚Äôll likely relax even more once he‚Äôs out of the shelter environment. He‚Äôs leash trained, house trained, and full of personality‚Äîlovable, intelligent, and always ready for fun.

name: Chewbaca
description_html:
His name is Chewbaca but all his staff and volunteer friends call him Chewy. Between his beautiful merle coat, pointy ears, and soft brown eyes Chewy quickly became a staff/volunteer favorite! Chewy likes to meet new humans gently but is cuddly and so so wiggly with his friends. The quickest way to Chewy‚Äôs heart is toys, hotdogs, more toys, and more hotdogs!


Chewy‚Äôs great leash manners make him a perfect walking buddy and his adorable zoomies in the yard are always full of charm. Chewy‚Äôs staff friends describe him as ‚Äúso dang precious‚Äù and ‚Äúso sweet.‚Äù


Have a dog at home? Chewy goes to playgroup at the shelter and is labeled as a solid coexister aka a real chill guy.


Ready to add some love to your life? Chewy is certain to put a smile on your face. Visit him at Austin Animal Services today!

name: Apple Fritter
description_html:
Apple Fritter is the perfect mix of sweetness and smarts! This loving, cuddly boy adores being close to his people - whether it‚Äôs snuggling on the couch or leaning in for a hug. He‚Äôs a great listener and eager to please, making him a joy to have around.


Apple Fritter is both crate trained and house trained, so he‚Äôs already mastered his manners and is ready to fit right into your home. He loves attention but also knows how to relax quietly when it‚Äôs time to wind down.


If you‚Äôre looking for a loyal companion who will shower you with affection and make every day brighter, Apple Fritter is your guy!

name: Hendrix
description_html:
Hendrix is a two-year-old heartthrob with one goal in life: to love his person with his entire soul. He‚Äôs fully house-trained, incredibly smart, and very treat-motivated (which means training with him is basically just a snack-based friendship).


His favorite ‚Äújob‚Äù at the shelter is visiting the real-life rooms on campus with volunteers, where he takes his snuggling very seriously. Couch? Claimed. Lap? Claimed. Emotional support duties? Nailed it. Hendrix doesn‚Äôt just cuddle ‚Äî he commits.


This boy is affectionate, gentle, and deeply people-oriented. He‚Äôs the kind of dog who looks at you like you‚Äôre his whole world‚Ä¶ because you are. Once Hendrix picks his person, that‚Äôs it ‚Äî you‚Äôve found your soul dog.


If you‚Äôre searching for a loyal best friend, a professional snuggler, and a dog who will love you harder than you thought possible, Hendrix is ready and waiting. Email orangedotcrew@gmail.com to learn more and kickstart this heartwarming journey! For more pupdates, follow Orange Dot Crew on Facebook and Instagram.

name: Howie
description_html:
Howie is a sweet German Shepherd who is housetrained, very playful, and easygoing! He's had experience living with another dog at the shelter and going to playgroup, so he could do well with a dog-sibling after a meet & greet to make sure it's a good fit!

Howie sits quickly for treats or toys and loves to show how smart he is. He loves to splash in the kiddie pool, chase balls, and walks great on a leash! He would make a lovely addition to your family.

name: Evermore
description_html:
Evermore is a very good boy who walks well on leash and will "sit" for a treat. He is housetrained and crate trained, as well. Evermore is affectionate with people and loves cuddles!


Evermore is a sweet, calm and gentle boy. He‚Äôs also one of the most housetrained dogs at the shelter. He does well meeting new people and he seems comfortable being around other dogs. He has lived with two different dogs in foster matching their vibes (one younger more playful and the other a senior professional relaxer!)

Evermore has done well on outings and in new environments. He takes it all in but will also sit at your feet while you enjoy a coffee in the sunshine.


Evermore loves to get out and explore, walking and sniffing like a champion. He also happily rides in the car, windows down if possible for the best sniffs!

He likes to play with toys and will play ball and with ropes toys especially. As well as being a great adventure buddy Evermore loves to relax and chill at home. A wonderful couch buddy!

name: Tigger
description_html:
Meet Tigger üíô


Tigger is one of those dogs who makes you smile the moment you meet him. Friendly, calm, and incredibly affectionate, he greets people with a loose, wiggly body, soft eyes, and a happy tail. Within minutes, he‚Äôs handing out kisses, leaning in for pets, and soaking up attention like he‚Äôs known you forever.


This sweet boy loves toys ‚Äî especially soft toys and tennis balls ‚Äî and will proudly bring them over to show off. In playtime rooms, he‚Äôs playful and happy, but he also knows how to relax and enjoy cuddles, belly rubs, and butt scratches. Volunteers consistently describe him as incredibly easy, well-mannered, and one of the most house-trained dogs they‚Äôve met in the shelter.


Tigger walks beautifully on leash and is very responsive to direction and cues. He knows how to sit, is treat-motivated, and does well transitioning in and out of his kennel. While he may show mild excitement when he sees other dogs, it‚Äôs friendly curiosity ‚Äî he‚Äôs non-reactive passing kennels and even stops to give sweet greetings through the gate, complete with wiggly tails and nose kisses.


He enjoys sniffing around, spending time with people, and would thrive in a home that offers love, routine, and maybe a few good toys to toss around. A house with a yard would be wonderful, but Tigger could also do well in an apartment with regular walks and enrichment.


Tigger is a laid-back cuddler with a playful side ‚Äî a truly special dog who‚Äôs ready to be someone‚Äôs best friend.


üí´ Good on leash

üí´ House-trained

üí´ Affectionate & cuddly

üí´ Toy-loving

üí´ Easy, gentle companion


If you‚Äôre looking for a sweet, loving dog who will adore you back tenfold, Tigger might just be your guy. üêæüíô

name: Daisy
description_html: Daisy is an adventurous soul who loves going on walks and exploring her surroundings. She can pull on leash, but she's working on that. Practice makes perfect! Daisy may be a little nervous with initial greetings, but it doesn't take long to see her tail wag and her body relax. She's ready to bust out of here and get on with her new life in a real home!

name: Canela
description_html: Canela has such a wonderful personality and is such a sweet girl. She‚Äôs playful and loves fetch with her stuffies (she‚Äôs pretty good at dropping them for you to toss too!). She also loves playing in the little puppy pools, and splashing around in them. She‚Äôs also very house trained! Once she works out her zoomies, she‚Äôs super easy on a leash. She‚Äôs a super cuddly young pup, and loves to lean against her human for pets and scratches.

name: Candy Corn
description_html:
Candy Corn is not your average dog! This handsome boy stands out with his incredibly unique eyes and coat‚Äîa striking brindle pattern set against an orange hue, earning him his sweet and tasty name.

He is a delightful companion who brings joy wherever he goes with his infectious smile.. Candy Corn is very housetrained and leash-trained, making him a breeze to live with. As a true Lab, he adores food and treats (which makes further training fun!).

He‚Äôs ready for fun with his favorite activity being fetch, which he‚Äôll happily play until you tire out. Candy Corn is a playful, loving, and unique pup ready to shower his forever family with affection!

name: Dokie
description_html:
Our charmer here is Dokie and he arrived weather worn and will appreciate a cozy place to stay while his body and soul catches up. He's very easy going and quite charming, gentle on a walk and overall an easy going friend to people and to dogs. We feel he'll get along well with most dogs that don't try to bulldoze him over.

Dokie is a great choice for those who want to help a good dog get back to his very best.

His eyes are receiving treatment and he has some other needs to be checked over.

Meet this sweetheart today. He's advocated for by his friends at Classic Canines ATX - Questions? If on site, reach out to staff. If offsite, reach out to his advocates caring@classiccanines.org

name: Peregrine
description_html:
Peregrine came in as a scaredy kitten, but she's grown into a shy but curious girl while she's been here. She enjoys pets and will stretch out and purr and might grab a bite to eat while you're petting her. Peregrine may still need a slow introduction to a new home (like most cats), but we don't think it will take long for her to settle in. Adopt this special girl today!

I am a DHC, and I have my own webpage!

The adoption fee is waived for Peregrine and ALL Cactus Cats/Desperate Housecats!

name: Gorda
description_html:
Gorda is the kind of dog who wins people over without even trying. She‚Äôs a joyful, wiggly, affectionate young pup who thinks every person she meets is her new best friend. Volunteers call her a ‚Äúwalking ray of sunshine‚Äù ‚Äî she‚Äôs gentle on leash, friendly with other dogs, and always excited to explore the world with her human friends.

This girl is curious, clever, and incredibly treat-motivated, which makes training fun and easy. She loves learning new things, bouncing around with her dog friends, and then flopping over for pets and cuddles. Gorda currently shares a suite with another dog and attends playgroup most mornings, where she consistently shows good doggy manners and a social, easygoing play style.


Because she‚Äôs still a young dog, Gorda needs a family who‚Äôs ready to embrace a little goofiness and continue helping her learn the ropes. She‚Äôs eager to please, responsive, and already has a great foundation ‚Äî she just needs patient humans who will show her how to be the best girl she can be.


Gorda‚Äôs Highlights:

‚Ä¢ Dog-friendly and enjoys playgroups

‚Ä¢ Gentle leash walker and easy to handle

‚Ä¢ Very treat-motivated and highly trainable

‚Ä¢ Sweet, snuggly, and people-loving

‚Ä¢ Playful puppy energy in a compact, adorable package


If you‚Äôre looking for a cheerful, affectionate, fun-loving companion who will brighten your days and always be excited to see you, Gorda might be your perfect match. Come meet her ‚Äî this sweet girl is so ready for a home of her own. üíõ

name: Sushi
description_html:
Move over Pizza and step back Hamburger‚ÄîMr Sushi has entered the chat! He's a polka dot prince who‚Äôs got a lot to say. Mostly filing official complaints about how you aren‚Äôt playing with or petting him. 


He adores attention from humans and may give you a nip to get it‚Äîso he will be best in a house with no kids. Sushi has lived with a dogs and cats before and what he would probably enjoy most is a pet companion to play and wrestle with.


So if you are in the market for a lovable and loyal boy and wanna boop his perfect black nose for a lifetime, get your application in!

name: Mojo
description_html:
Meet Mojo ‚Äî the ultimate cuddle bug with a heart of gold

Mojo‚Äôs love languages are absolutely physical touch and quality time. He‚Äôll accept gifts if you insist, but what he truly wants is to be as close to his human as possible. From the moment you meet him, his gentle, affectionate nature shines. This boy is all about closeness, connection, and soaking up every bit of love he can get.


Mojo is a dream on leash, checks in often with his walker, and already knows cues like sit and shake. He‚Äôs polite, well-mannered, and radiates ‚ÄúI want to be your best friend‚Äù energy. He also keeps his kennel impressively tidy, suggesting he may be house trained. Passing people and dogs? No problem for this calm, steady guy‚Äîhe simply minds his manners and keeps moving.


If you‚Äôre looking for an affectionate, easygoing companion who loves deeply and loyally, Mojo is your match. Come see why everyone falls for this handsome lovebug.

name: T-Bone
description_html:
T-Bone came to the shelter as a very scared kitten. He immediately went into nose-boop training to help him build confidence. While he's made progress at kitten boop camp, he still needs some extra guidance and support in a new home. T-Bone is a shy guy who may choose to run from new people.

T-Bone has joined our Cactus Cat program to get extra guidance from volunteers on being brave and making friends with people! Cactus Cats tend to love other cats, so these guys may do well in a home with a social kitty friend.

I am a DHC, and I have my own webpage!

The adoption fee is waived for T-Bone and ALL Cactus Cats/Desperate Housecats!

name: Mesquite
description_html: Mesquite is a shy baby boy who seems to like the company of other cats. If you go slowly, you can make friends with him, too! The shelter can be a scary place, so we understand that this boy just needs a quiet and calm space to relax. He's an affectionate boy stuck in a scaredy cat body for now! Help Mesquite grow into a confident boy through adoption or foster today!

name: Ash
description_html:
Hi there! I‚Äôm Ash, a bundle of joy packed with curiosity and energy.


Every day is a new adventure for me, and I love exploring every nook and cranny of my surroundings. I‚Äôm also quite the brainy pup, always eager to learn new tricks and solve puzzles. My friends here say

I‚Äôm sweet and always sporting a smile, which makes every day brighter. I dream of a home where I can share all this love and excitement. I'm also house trained!


If you‚Äôre looking for a loyal friend to add zest to your life, I‚Äôm your guy!

name: Gingersnap
description_html:
Hi! I'm Gingersnap.


My days are filled with joy and I love sharing it! I'm young and full of life. I do the cutest play bow with a hippity hop when playing in the yard and I can't help but make everyone laugh with my silly antics. I love other dogs and would be great in a home with another furry sibling. I'm also housetrained! Sometimes I'm a bit shy, but I'm brave enough to try new things every day. Just go slow with me. The world is so big and I need time to acclimate to it. I dream of a home where I can share all my love and laughter. If you're looking for a sweet, playful companion, I'm your girl! Let's make each other's lives brighter!

name: Lopez
description_html:
Lopez might seem shy at first, but he‚Äôs a total sweetheart who‚Äôs ready to be someone‚Äôs best friend. He‚Äôs potty trained, very anffectionate and loves being close to his people. If you‚Äôre looking for a dog who enjoys gentle companionship and plenty of love, Lopez is your guy.

For walks, just grab a harness and Lopez is a breeze ‚Äî he‚Äôs easy to walk and happy to stroll by your side, making him a great match for both relaxed outings and daily routines.

Lopez would do wonderfully in a home that values cuddles, a sweet shy pup, and a loyal companion. Come meet him ‚Äît it won‚Äôt take long to see how special he is

name: Ink
description_html: Ink is a happy-go-lucky guy who‚Äôs always up for whatever adventure you have in mind - especially if it involves toys! Ink LOVES a toy and will get so excited he will jog around with it happily, plop in your lap to show you, and then jog around with it again. Despite his enthusiasm, Ink is surprisingly easy to handle ‚Äî volunteers found him simple to harness and eager to head out for fun. Once in the play yard, Ink is in his element: zooming around, chasing toys, and soaking up every moment. Outside the play yard, Ink is also a great jogging buddy in the making and happily kept pace on a short jog with one of his volunteer friends. He knows sit, likes treats, and is a smart boy who will be easy to train and be up for any adventure with his new people!

name: Chiquis
description_html:
If you‚Äôre looking for a dog who can make you laugh every single day, meet Chiquis ‚Äî a tiny powerhouse with a HUGE zest for life. Volunteers describe her as a ‚Äúbusy lady‚Äù who would rather zoom, hop, and play than sit still for a photo. She loves toys, loves movement, and loves turning the play yard into her personal racetrack.


Chiquis has classic puppy-style enthusiasm: she can be a little jumpy when excited, but she responds well to redirection and absolutely thrives when given something fun to do. She‚Äôs sweet, playful, and people-oriented, and once she burns off a little energy, her softer side starts peeking through.


Because she‚Äôs new to the shelter, we‚Äôre still learning all her quirks ‚Äî but what we know so far is that she‚Äôs spirited, silly, and ready for an adopter who appreciates a high-energy, toy-driven companion.


Chiquis would love a home with:

‚úî Playtime, toys, and activities

‚úî Positive training to help channel her enthusiasm

‚úî Someone who appreciates an energetic, goofy pup


If you‚Äôre searching for a pocket-sized adventure buddy who brings joy everywhere she goes, come meet Chiquis ‚Äî she‚Äôs ready to run right into her new life.

Interested in Chiquis? Reach out to blueplusbusters@gmail.com for more info!

name: S'Mores
description_html:
S‚ÄôMores may start out a little cautious, but once he feels safe, he becomes an incredibly loving dog. Volunteers say he‚Äôs a ‚Äúhuge love bug‚Äù in a calm setting ‚Äî leaning in for affection, relaxing beside his person, and showing a softness that‚Äôs easy to fall for. He‚Äôs also house-trained (he pees as soon as he reaches the grass!) and walks calmly on leash once he settles into his routine. Because S‚ÄôMores is touch-sensitive, he needs a slow, gentle approach when meeting new people. With patience, he opens up beautifully.


S‚ÄôMores‚Äô best qualities:

  • Affectionate and snuggly with familiar human friends
  • Walks nicely on leash
  • House-trained
  • Responds well to routine and gentle handling


Best fit:

  • Patient adopter willing to go slow
  • Someone who understands sensitive, thoughtful dogs


S‚ÄôMores is a tender-hearted guy who just needs the right person to help him feel safe. Ready to take things slow? Come meet him today!

name: Squilliam Fancyson
description_html:
Squilliam Fancyson is the definition of handsome! He loves to sniff around on walks, is great with other dogs, and enjoys pets.


He loves to play hard to get by walking around as if you aren't there, but once you get his attention he's actually a softie!


Come meet Squilliam Fancyson today!

name: Twilight
description_html:
‚ú® Meet Twilight ‚ú®

2 years | Shepherd‚ÄìRottweiler mix | 74 lbs | Female


Twilight is a stunning, calm, and deeply loyal girl with the perfect balance of maturity and playfulness. She‚Äôs medium-energy, well-mannered, and incredibly affectionate with her people.


She‚Äôs fully potty and crate trained, walks beautifully on leash, and knows her basic commands. On walks, Twilight is focused and composed ‚Äî no pulling, no chaos, just an easy, well-behaved companion. She does great when left alone and greets you with happy energy when you return.


At home, Twilight loves:

‚Ä¢ Playing fetch (especially in close quarters)

‚Ä¢ Treats and toys

‚Ä¢ Long naps

‚Ä¢ Walks and car rides

‚Ä¢ And most of all‚Ä¶ cuddles and kisses üíï


Twilight bonds deeply with her humans and has a natural instinct to guard and protect the people she loves. She‚Äôs social and friendly with adults and does well meeting new people, especially when she senses her person feels at ease.


Twilight is the kind of dog who gives her whole heart once she chooses you. If you‚Äôre looking for a devoted, affectionate companion who will love you fiercely and curl up beside you at the end of the day ‚Äî she may be your girl üí´

name: Lady Pablo
description_html:
Meet Lady Pablo

She's been recently paired with a couple of sweet makeover agents, her foster parents, who along with the sponsored care she receives from her friends at ClassicCaninesATX, are restoring her body and spirit. She had been left behind in the washroom of an apartment building, heavily matted into a large fur ball. We don't believe she was ever left outdoors. Someone taught this sweet baby love, they simply did not have the ability to care for her.

She's spayed and heartworm negative. Her weight is perfect. Her matts have been shaved off and for the first time in years she is walking on her real paws, she can feel wind on her skin, her body is capable of full stretches, she can run and fully "feel" again. With that comes time to adjust to her new body and touch, requiring understanding, patience and light management by her VIPs. She loves love and has a spirit that will warm your soul, but can be subject to occasional startles--her body is new to her..

Lady Pablo seems to be very content near cats.

She's had limited engagement with dogs and seems to mostly co-exist, although we think she would prefer to have all of the people attention for herself.

Her ideal person or people will have some experience with small dogs that need a little extra help and guidance in life, It's her turn to catch up for all the years she's lost out on.

Interested in learning more?

Click on her link to reach her foster parents.

name: Goldie
description_html: Gorgeous girl Goldie is a 9 month old Belgian Shepherd thriving in foster! Goldie is a lovely sweet goofball and will grow up to be an elegant, long-legged blonde! If she was a person, she'd be a supermodel! At 9 months old she is about 50 pounds and will likely top out around 60 pounds She can be a little shy meeting new humans, but warms up quickly. She recently attended several busy adoption events full of new people, dogs, sights and sounds and Goldie was a perfect little lady and behaved beautifully. She was great with all the kids who stopped to pet her as well. She is about 99% potty trained and she's a natural at walking on a loose leash! She adores fetch and tug-of-war. She loves to play with other dogs and wears out her two big canine foster brothers running around the yard. She has been around a cat and wanted to play with it. But she's still a puppy and can adapt to living with cats. This sweet little lady would make a stellar family dog and a great active buddy for anyone looking for a pup that is equal parts energetic adventurer and snugglebug! Could she be your dreamgirl???

name: Ginger
description_html:
Ginger is a smart, curious pup. She is super focused on you or cheese or that sound coming from over there. She's housetrained and treat-motivated, making her training a joy, knowing basic commands like "sit."

Ginger enjoys exploring, a good sniff, and looking out the window. She'll also do zoomies and is soooo happy to run around the yard and stretch her legs. She loves her humans and gives sweet little kisses.

She's really fun and full of energy. Come meet her today!

name: Falcor
description_html:
Falcor is a big, gorgeous boy who is very friendly and gentle - no stranger danger! He was surrendered to AAC with a urethral obstruction, and made a full recovery from surgery that removed the narrowest part of his urethra. He has easily transitioned to an anti-inflammatory diet to reduce and help prevent bladder inflammation going forward. 

Falcor is agile and playful, and will fetch toy mice. His meows are tiny, and he will gently raise his front paws onto your legs when he wants attention.

Falcor will do best in a household as an only pet or where his access to food is separate from other pets. He would be a GREAT family pet, but beware, you are liable to get lost in his crystal blue eyes!

Visit Falcor on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/falcor_blue?igsh=N3M4dHBjOWN1ejdz

I am a DHC, and I have my own webpage!

The adoption fee is waived for Falcor and all Desperate Housecats!

name: Aki
description_html:
Meet Aki! üå∏üêæ


Aki is a sweet, gentle puppy with lovely manners and an especially endearing way of sitting politely and gazing up at you while she waits for affection. She‚Äôs house trained, walks beautifully on leash, and brings a playful spark wherever she goes.


She loves toys and playtime, and balances her puppy energy with a soft, affectionate nature. Aki can be a bit shy in busy environments, but with patience and reassurance she settles in and shows her warm, loving personality.


If you‚Äôre looking for a well-mannered young companion with both charm and playfulness, Aki is sure to steal your heart.

name: Angel
description_html:
~ Meet Angel

With 11 yrs of wisdom she's demonstrated herself well as a perfect house mate. Her owner went into hospice. See her short video to see how she has coped with life in the kennel. She's a low maintenance lady who has short spurts of activity before settling in to watch the world from a window view. Let's resolve to make her stay in the shelter system a short one. And if you will give her some small but important pleasures, like letting her hide her toys outdoors, even though they are barely hidden, and offering a cozy cushy place to rest, she promises to be your very best and quiet friend. And she'll love your friends and family too, including the kiddos. Angel is family friendly and ready to spend the holiday in a forever home.


All Adopters of dogs 7 yrs and up receive a $150 veterinary care credit, a $100 Chewy eGift card and adoption fees are waived - ready to make a difference? Reach out to caring@classiccanines.org

name: Mama Eden
description_html:
Mama is an affectionate, high energy girl who wants to soak up all life has to offer. Her favorite things are walks, hikes, playing with her foster brother, and snuggling up for long naps. She has the cutest, most expressive eyes that will truly convey all the love she has for her people. 



Extra info: She would do best in a home with an active lifestyle. She requires A LOT of walks and/or play. She‚Äôs a big love bug that is still learning her size, so I don‚Äôt think a home with small children would be a good fit.

name: Sawyer
description_html:
Sawyer is a magnificent Mastiff with a heart as big as he is! Although Sawyer is a very big boy, he is the definition of a gentle giant. Don't let his size fool you‚Äîthis boy is an absolute cuddlebug who thrives on affection and loves nothing more than leaning in for some quality snuggle time.

Sawyer has an incredibly playful spirit and is always up for a good time. He loves to chase balls and play with stuffies. He's also very housetrained and good on a leash. He does need a strong handler as he can pull when he sees something exciting, like a squirrel.  

Ready to add a loyal, loving, and slightly oversized goofball to your family? Sawyer is waiting to fill your home with cuddles and joy!

name: Meatloaf
description_html: Meatloaf may be all muscle on the outside, but inside he's just waiting for an opportunity for cuddles and play time. He's a goofy guy who loves to go on walks, but still learning those leash skills. (Meatloaf has yet to look in the mirror and realize how thick his own neck is.) He loves treats and will easily sit for them. He immediately becomes a happy boy when he gets to go on a walk and hang out with people. Meatloaf would probably LOVE a yard to hang out in.
